尋.definition: to search; to look for; to seek

尋仇.definition: to carry out a vendetta against sb

尋出.definition: to find out; to search out; to uncover; to discover

尋址.definition: to address; to search for address; to input data into memory

尋摸.definition: to look for; to explore; to probe

尋根.definition: to seek one's roots; to get to the bottom of a matter

尋根問底.definition: lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth

尋根溯源.definition: see 追根溯源[zhui1 gen1 su4 yuan2]

尋死.definition: to attempt suicide; to court death

尋烏.definition: Xunwu county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州[Gan4 zhou1], Jiangxi

尋烏縣.definition: Xunwu county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州[Gan4 zhou1], Jiangxi

尋獲.definition: to find; to track down; to recover (sth lost)

尋花問柳.definition: lit. to enjoy the beautiful spring scenery (idiom); fig. to frequent brothels; to sow one's wild oats

尋訪.definition: to inquire after; to look for (sb)

尋釁.definition: to pick a quarrel; to start a fight

尋開心.definition: to make fun of; to seek diversion
